Name: Vanessa Ganzaroli
Description:
Vanessa's naked body was found in an irrigation canal in a rural area. She had been stabbed three times.

It is thought that she had been killed elsewhere and her body carried along by the current.

> On the morning of Friday (03), at around 08h30, the police were called to verify an alleged homicide in the Senator Nilo Coelho Project, N-11, near the Timbaúba Farm, rural Petrolina-PE. 
> 
> According to the police, the body was in a hard to reach location in an irrigation canal, which was dammed in one of the water retention terminals. It was displaced by the water current where the channel was opened. 
>
> The victim was identified, preliminarily, as: [deadname] Pereira da Silva. 18 years old, known as “Vanessa Ganzaroli”, a [trans woman] born in the city of Serra Talhada-PE. The victim's body was naked and had 03 (three) stab wounds caused by a knife. 
>
> Friends informed Portal Nayn Neto that [she] had left home in the city of Petrolina on Friday (03), and until today they had not heard any news. They also said that she went to live in the city of Petrolina-PE, a few years ago.

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & Belmonte Diário 04.04.2015

https://web.archive.org/web/20180822035748/http://www.belmontediario.com.br:80/2015/04/imagem-forte-jovem-homossexual-de-serra.html

Name: Simeona Eva
Description:
Simeona was stabbed 7 times all over her body.

 According to unverified reports, she was "napagtripan" ("doing it for fun") on her way home the previous night.

TvT partner organization: STRAP

https://www.facebook.com/violenceinthephilippines/photos/a.361854607318976.1073741829.346731232164647/411680369003066/?type=3&theater

Name: Sana
Description:
Sana was killed by a group of men who attacked her group. The perpetrators also killed one of her cisgender colleages and gang raped one of her trans colleages.

> PESHAWAR, Pakistan (AFP) – Armed men in northwest Pakistan abducted and gang-raped a transgender person on Monday after killing two other people in a pre-dawn incident, police said.
>
> The incident took place in the Yar Hussain neighbourhood of Swabi district, where a group of transgenders was returning home after performing a music and dance show at a wedding party.
>
> Sajjad Khan, district police chief of Swabi in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province, said the men were waiting for them in a field and tried to abduct all of them but they refused.
>
> "The attackers opened fire after the refusal. One transgender and one drummer died on the spot while another was wounded," Khan said.
>
>The armed men then abducted one transgender who was released hours later, Khan said.
>
> "The victim told police that he was set free after being gang-raped by four persons," the police officer added.
>
> Police later raided separate locations and arrested six suspects, charging them with murder and gang-rape, Khan said.

TvT project: The News Pakistan 07.04.2015 & News East West 06.04.2015

http://www.jamaicaobserver.com/news/One-transgender-gang-raped--two-killed-in-northwest-Pakistan--police

Name: Victória Camargo
Description:
Victória was shot dead in the center of the city on the night of 12th April. CCTV cameras of commercial establishments revealed that two people were responsible.

It was subsequently determined that of the two her killer was dead and that his accomplice was in jail.

> Investigators agents discovered that one of the suspects was detained at the State Penitentiary of Venâncio Aires (Peva). The boy, who was a minor at the time of the crime, confirmed that he was one of the people who appears in the footage. The other, he revealed, was shot dead in 2017.
>
> According to the young man who is incarcerated - and who is now 20 years old - on the night that Victoria was killed, he attended a relative's funeral, when he was invited to go along and collect a debt. However, he revealed to the PC agents he knew the other guy was armed.
> 
> From the images, the agents confirm that the boy in Peva spoke the truth and that Victoria was killed by the other individual. Aside from this case, the young man who is being held in Peva, accused of having an illegal weapon possession in Canoas, is responsible for an execution in 2016, also in the center of Venâncio.

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & Independente 13.04.2015

http://www.folhadomate.com/noticias/policia/policia-desvenda-execucao-de-transexual-em-2015-no-centro-de-venancio

http://www.folhadomate.com/noticias/policia/morre-a-segunda-vitima-do-fim-de-semana-em-venancio-aires

Name: Bruna Quércia
Description:
Bruna was shot dead by two men on a motorcycle.

> A 15-year-old girl was shot dead last night in the Vila Velha neighborhood . According to police, two gunmen on a motorbike found the [trans woman] walking down Avenida Major Assis, where she headed to Praia de Iracema to a prostitution point.
>
> According to the Homicide Division delegate, Cleófilo Rodrigues, the motive for the crime was drug debt. Known as "Bruna Quércia" and identified as 15-year-old [deadname] de Oliveira Costa, she was already receiving death threats because she was a drug user and owed money to drug dealers in the area.

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found on the morning of Friday 17th April. She had been beaten and strangled.

> A young unidentified [trans woman] was found dead with signs of beating and strangulation on the morning of Friday (17), in an area between Rua das Joias with Rua Filodendro, Jorge Teixeira neighborhood, East Zone of Manaus.
>  
> According to local people, the victim is not known in the area. She had painted nails and was wearing a bra. 
>
> The body was in front of a house and was first seen by a boy in the morning when leaving his home. "I didn't hear any noise, but in the morning, when my son was leaving for work, he saw the body in front to our house, so we called the police," said the local resident, who declined to identify himself.

The victim's death was not recorded on the official TDoR 2015 list released by Transgender Europe (TGEU) in November 2015. The report of her murder was found as a result of a blogpost by [La Asociación de Transexuales de Andalucía](http://www.atandalucia.org/2015/11/dia-de-la-memoria-transgenero-2015.html).

http://www.portaldoholanda.com.br/policial/travesti-e-espancado-e-estrangulado-no-jorge-teixeira

Name: Bianca Bittencourt
Description:
Bianca was stabbed by a cisgender colleague after an argument over a prostitution point.

> An unidentified [trans woman] was stabbed in the chest on Saturday morning (18). The case took place on 9th Street of Sector 2, in Ariquemes (RO), city of Jamari Valley. Another 24-year-old [trans woman] and a 27-year-old [cisgender] woman were arrested on suspicion of the crime. They claimed that the victim was charging $ 500 for a prostitution point, which caused an argument. The [trans woman] died after being admitted to the Regional Hospital.
>
> The suspect told the police that she did sex programs, just as the victim did. During the fight, the [cisgender] woman reportedly stabbed the victim. The knife used in the crime was not found. Those involved were heard at the police station but were released.

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & Globo 18.04.2015

http://g1.globo.com/ro/ariquemes-e-vale-do-jamari/noticia/2015/04/travesti-e-morto-ao-cobrar-por-ponto-de-prostituicao-em-ariquemes-ro.html

Name: Diosvany Muñoz Robaina ("La Eternal")
Description:
Diosvany was stoned to death by a group of adolescents in the Roberto Amarán park.

> It seemed that she was eternal until one morning in April a stone destroyed her spleen and she bled to death. Born in the wrong body, at the age of fifteen she infected herself with the HIV virus in a desperate gesture. "Mommy, why didn't you give birth to me as a female, if I'm a tremendous woman?" she would say to Berta Robaina. Until recently this mother assured: "I have three children", but now she clarifies: "I had, I had ... Now I only have two."
>
> Diosvany Muñoz Robaina's death was like her own life: hard and short. One dawn at the end of April, when she already believed herself undefeated against prejudice, abuse and AIDS, a group of teenagers threw a volley of stones at her that ended her life. Hours later the sun would rise, while her lifeless body waited at the Pedro Borrás polyclinic in Pinar del Río. For the machos remachos in the area, just "one more fag" had died.

TvT partner organization: Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans www.14ymedio.com   09.05.2015

Name: Almaroof Bijli
Description:
Almaroof Bijli's body was discovered mutilated and burned near a Gungal busstop on 5th May. She had reportedly been missing for 10 days before her body was discovered, and authorities confirmed that her remains suggested she had died 10 days prior.

While Islamabad police are hesitant to declare Bijli's death a murder, the "mysterious circumstances" she was found in suggest to her loved ones that she was indeed, killed.

Her death was followed three days later by the possibly hate-motivated drive-by shooting of three trans women in Rawalpindi.

TvT project: The Tribune 07.05.2015 & The Advocate 12.05.2015

https://www.advocate.com/crime/2015/05/12/four-pakistani-trans-women-mysteriously-murdered-within-one-week-0

https://lexiecannes.com/2015/05/14/trans-woman-reportedly-stoned-to-death-in-cuba-in-pakistan-trans-killings-continue-4-dead/

Name: Palanisamy
Description: TvT project: The Hindu 03.05.2015

Name: Steffany
Description:
Steffany was shot in her hairdressing salon on the evening of Thursday 30th April. Two suspects were apprehended by police.

> A [trans woman] was murdered early on Thursday night (30) in the city of Caucaia, in the Metropolitan Region of Fortaleza. The victim was shot in her salon. Two murder suspects were captured by military police. In less than 24 hours, eight murders have been recorded in the area.
>
> The crime against the hairdresser occurred at around 7 pm. At this time teams from the Homicide and Personnel Protection Division (DHPP), the Ceará State Forensic Forensic Expertise (Pefoce) and the chief of the Legal Medicine Coordination (Comel) are still at the crime scene, along with patrols of the Ronda do Block and 12th BPM (Caucaia).
> 
> According to initial police reports, the assailants broke into the victim's salon on Rua 145 Nova Metrópole and fired several shots at close range, giving the victim no chance to react. The dead [woman] was identified only as "Stefanny".

http://www.blogdofernandoribeiro.com.br/index.php/81-categorias/violencia-urbana/761-cabeleireiro-e-fuzilado-dentro-de-seu-salao-de-beleza-em-caucdo-dentro-de-seu-salao-de-b
